comments: #csv file with all the info
#up to 4 sample racks allowed (24 1.5 ml eppies each); for a deep well sample plate use 0 (zero)
#mm above the bottom of the sample for aspiration
#number of seconds that the tip remains in the sample liquid after aspiration
#Mix before aspirating (0=False, 1=True)
#volume used to mix (ul)
#number of replicate mixes using mix_vol
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack
#Falcon 15 ml and 50 ml are the only options (must be '15 ml' or '50 ml')
#total starting volume of diluent (ul); needed to set the pipette tip depth
#to skip this step use 0 (zero); to include this step use 1
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack rack
#starting amount of tcep solution (ul)
#volume of tcep solution to add to each well (ul)
#to skip this step use 0 (zero); to include this step use 1
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack rack
#starting amount of iam solution (ul)
#volume of iam solution to add to each well (ul)
#use control 1 (0=False, 1=True); 'cntl1'
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack
#control samples have to be in 1.5,  2.0, or 15 ml tubes
#total volume available for control 1
#use control 2 (0=False, 1=True)
#If 15 ml or 50 ml then use the tube rack; if 2 ml then use the 2 ml rack
#control samples have to be in 1.5,  2.0, or 15 ml tubes
#total volume available for control 1
